LanguageData.ColaBasin.label: Quantum Cola Core Machine
LanguageData.GECK.label: Garden of Eden Generator Compact
LanguageData.GECK.description: Garden of Eden Generator Compact. This is standard equipment in all Vault-Tec shelters. The GECK is the source of civilization's restoration after the bombardment. Just add water and stir.
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.label: Medicine Doll
LanguageData.VaultBoyMedicine.description: Medicine Doll - A smart person understands that the wound under the bandage is not going away.
LanguageData.VaultBoyEloquence.label: Eloquence Doll
LanguageData.VaultBoyEloquence.description: Eloquence Doll - I want the pen to be equated with the bayonet.
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.label: Boy "Intelligence"
LanguageData.VaultBoyIntelligence.description: Intelligence Doll - Always be ready to answer a hundred thousand whys.
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.label: Repair Doll
LanguageData.VaultBoyRepair.description: Repair Doll - Why go down with the ship if you can fix it?
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.label: Barter Doll
LanguageData.VaultBoyBarter.description: Barter Doll - The amount of good you have should always increase.
